main event: A series of unidentified flying objects were spotted over Italy in September 1960.
interesting points: The UFOs were described as silver-colored, disc-shaped objects flying in formation over Rome.
The objects were observed for approximately 5 minutes before disappearing.
The UFOs were reported to be hovering and making no sound.
Later, three dark, triangular-shaped UFOs were spotted in the sky over Ravenna, Italy, observed by several people for around 10 minutes.
The Ravenna UFOs were flying at an altitude of 3,000-4,000 feet and at a speed of around 500 mph.
sighted object: Silver disc-shaped objects and dark triangular objects
witnesses: Mr. Carlo Gattini and several other persons
